questions: Based on the results above, how strong do you think player {{player}} is?
How likely is it that {{player}} was lazy in Game {{match}}?
How likely is it that {{player1}} would beat {{player2}} in a match?
prompt:
Below you see the outcomes of games in a tug of war tournament. Remember that the crown indicates which team won each game. You can move the mouse over a player to see which games the player participated in. Please try to figure out, based on the information you see, how strong player {{player}} is.

You can hover the mouse over a player to see that player highlighted. You can click on a player to see what games the player participated in.
